website_summaries.verdict: A water cream formula with pink rock rose and willowherb from Canada to smooth skin, even tone, and give a radiant look.
pros: This gel is light, fresh, and floral, and leaves your skin matte and ready for makeup
It helps make pores look smaller and smells fresh
Those with oily skin also found it minimizes breakthrough during the day
cons: Some found that the cream pilled or beaded up and had to be wiped off, leaving a dry feeling

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for oily/dry skin. Matte finish holds up over time!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THISSSSS! Such a great find for someone with oily/dry skin. It smells really good and feels tingly refreshing when you put it on. I don’t feel like I need foundation when putting it in because it does have a matte finish that holds over time. Also works great under my makeup when I do wear it.
customer_reviews.author: ohdanielley

customer_reviews.title: so perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. I use my have rolled after applying & my pores are less visible, skin feels healthy & it really holds my make up while I'm serving for 19 hours at a bar!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gladice

customer_reviews.title: Just buy at macy's or sephora
customer_reviews.text: Just buy at Macy's or Sephora, you'll get .7 oz more for the same price $35
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattifying Moisturizer Ive Tried
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is the best around when it comes to fighting oily skin throughout the day. Although it doesn't necessarily last ALL day, apply it once right after your shower and it will fight off the glow much longer than other moisturizers that claim to matte your face. It also smells incredible; like a mix between orange sorbet and a creamsicle. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Best one ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best moisturizer that I have ever used. I have used several moisturizers in the past but this one is great. It goes on very smooth without feeling greasy and it doesn’t leave your skin looking shiny either when you put it on. Plus it smells good too
customer_reviews.author: Spaniard

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizers and isn't heavy
customer_reviews.text: Works for my oily skin. Looks matte, feels great on my skin and hasn't caused breakouts. In the morning my skin is a bit oily but that's the way my skin is.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: my favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go- to moisturizer for about 2 years. I have oily skin and it keeps my face matte for most of the day. It doesn't have an overbearing smell; just soft and gentle.
customer_reviews.author: aea0060

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is my very favorite moisturizer I’ve ever owned Sephora recommendation and I’ve been using it since it’s just cheaper here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Paige Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Not Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This "moisturizer" left my skin feeling very dry. It's a tiny tub for the big price. I didn't care for the scent either.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Felt bad on my face
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a matte finish with this product and it still seemed shiny when applied and given time to air dry. The second it went on my skin started burning a bit and that’s why I can’t recommend this especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very small container but luckily a little goes along way!
customer_reviews.author: Joni H

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This has been very moisturizing and also has a great smell. I use every night before I go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Annette E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 100/100 Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is absolutely amazing. I noticed a difference after one use. I have super oily skin and this is PERFECT for it! Makes your skin so soft and bright. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Cochran

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t live the skin feeling grease.
customer_reviews.text: It feels very good on, specially for my oily skin. It did not leave my skin shining, is matte but you can fell your skin moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda N. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, great smell and love the texture that leaves on the skin
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Not Matte
customer_reviews.text: I thought would leave a matte look but did not and my face was still shining within 2hours :(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rollings

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think it was this small. You can get the bigger one for the same price somewhere else. But the product itself is good.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Lamb

customer_reviews.title: The best all-around moisturizer I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t written a review in a long time but this product took deserves it. This is the second tub I’ve ordered. I absolutely love this moisturizer. I have really sensitive/acne-prone/dry/just-plain-difficult skin. I have tried a lot of different brands and they either dry me out more or make me break out. I don’t give this product full credit for my skin’s improvement, but it has been the best addition to my routine. The scent is light and neutral, and one small tub goes a LONG way. I would give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I need to oil blotte several times a day still. This initially applied makes your skin look matte, but 20 min later, it's oily.
customer_reviews.author: beans

customer_reviews.title: Great but small in size
customer_reviews.text: Small container for price but it worked well to moisture skin and keep me matte. Smelled nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Smoothing
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite creams from Origins. It smooths the skin and soothes inflammation better than any other. I have used it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin and this is a great moisturizer for it. It smells so fresh, is lightweight, and has a naturally matte finish. It’s comparable to Hydroboost but actually helps with oil control.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

product_meta.title: Original Skin Matte Moisturizer With Willowherb, 1-oz.
product_meta.description: A deliciously hydrating lush water cream that softens, smooths and visibly minimizes pores for a gorgeously glowing look. Gives skin the glow it's been looking for. Boosts moisture, evens tone, refines texture and visibly minimizes pores with willowherb for a look that's soft, smooth, fresh and vibrant. As early as your twenties, everyday environmental stress can lead to a dullness-causing protein change in skin. That's where willowherb comes in. It helps inhibit that dullness-causing protein change and restore your natural, gorgeous glow.
